page.title: 20SKIPTON GALA DAY
page.content: On Saturday, 8th June 1985, Skipton Charities Gala Day was held. The Gala started with a procession through the town and on to Aireville Park for judging. In the procession were fire engines, trade vehicles, people in fancy dress, morris dancers, uniformed organizations and bands. When the prcession past people went to the fair. At the fair there were lots of rides like:{The Torndo Express, Human {Dust Bins,}and{The Speed Way.}One of the most poular rides was{The Walzer. In the Afternoon there were{Football and{Rugby}in the Arena. At the end they set off lots of Fireworks.
